x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: In many organizations, IT support operations face challenges in maintaining service quality and user satisfaction. End users often raise issues (e.g., system errors, network downtime, software requests), but the communication loop usually ends once the ticket is resolved. Without structured feedback, IT teams struggle to measure service quality, identify recurring problems, or improve response processes.
